title: i cant use store
body:
Whenever I click on the store it just goes to a black page, all the other screens on the client work but the store

ive tried restarting and everything, still doesnt work

replies.body: Earlier today we noticed that some players are having troubles accessing the store in the client. We're working on getting the store working again, and you can stay up to date in our post [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load).
